channel.title: Papers on Cecília Coelho
channel.description: Recent content in Papers on Cecília Coelho

item.title: Neural Chronos ODE: Modelling bidirectional temporal patterns in time-series data
item.description: This work introduces Neural Chronos Ordinary Differential Equations (Neural CODE), a deep neural network architecture that fits a continuous-time ODE dynamics for predicting the chronology of a system both forward and backward in time. Published in Expert Systems with Applications, 2025.
